message: Test cases generated from use case

data.title: Reset Password with Valid Credentials

gherkin.given: User is logged in with valid credentials
gherkin.then: Password reset form appears with fields to enter new password

data.expected_result: Password reset successful, user receives confirmation email

data.title: Reset Password with Invalid Credentials

gherkin.given: User is logged in with invalid credentials
gherkin.then: Error message appears indicating invalid credentials

data.expected_result: Password reset failed, error message displayed

data.title: Reset Password with Empty Fields

gherkin.given: User is logged in with valid credentials
gherkin.then: Error message appears indicating required fields are missing

data.expected_result: Password reset failed, error message displayed

data.title: Reset Password with Special Characters
steps: 1. Enter special character in current password field

gherkin.given: User is logged in with valid credentials
gherkin.then: Password reset form accepts special characters

data.expected_result: Password reset successful, user receives confirmation email
